NFR — System Constraints (Boundaries)

Hardware & Environment Limits

Constraint: Target Environment NFR-1
links outgoing: BRD-6
links incoming: NFR-1.1, NFR-1.2, NFR-1.3, NFR-1.4, NFR-1.5, NFR-1.6, FSD-4.4, FSD-5
Constraint: **CPU:** AMD Ryzen 9 5900X (Audio/Core must run here). NFR-1.1
links outgoing: NFR-1
Constraint: **GPU:** RTX 3080 10GB VRAM (Runtime/Inference only). NFR-1.2
links outgoing: NFR-1
Constraint: **RAM:** 32GB System Memory. NFR-1.3
links outgoing: NFR-1
Constraint: **OS:** Windows 11 Pro x64. NFR-1.4
links outgoing: NFR-1
Constraint: **Python:** Version >= 3.11. NFR-1.5
links outgoing: NFR-1
Constraint: **CUDA:** Toolkit installed for GPU inference. NFR-1.6
links outgoing: NFR-1
Constraint: Security & Network NFR-2
links outgoing: BRD-3, BRD-6
links incoming: NFR-2.1, NFR-2.2, SAD-3
Constraint: All communication limited to local TCP sockets (`127.0.0.1`) via ZeroMQ. NFR-2.1
links outgoing: NFR-2
Constraint: No cloud dependencies allowed for runtime operations. NFR-2.2
links outgoing: NFR-2
Constraint: Resource Isolation NFR-3
links outgoing: BRD-3, BRD-6
links incoming: NFR-3.1, NFR-3.2, NFR-3.3, NFR-3.4, NFR-3.5, NFR-3.6, FSD-4, ICD-1, ISP-5
Constraint: **CPU Idle:** Processes polling for IPC messages must consume <5% CPU when idle. NFR-3.1
links outgoing: NFR-3
Constraint: **Audio Priority:** CPU-bound services (Audio) must prioritize low-latency over idle CPU. NFR-3.2
links outgoing: NFR-3
Constraint: **Memory Footprint (Core Queue):** 1000 cap, ~10-50 MB. NFR-3.3
links outgoing: NFR-3
Constraint: **Memory Footprint (UI Queue):** 100 cap, ~1-5 MB. NFR-3.4
links outgoing: NFR-3
Constraint: **Memory Footprint (Runtime Queue):** 50 cap, ~5-25 MB. NFR-3.5
links outgoing: NFR-3
Constraint: **Memory Footprint (Audio Queue):** 50 cap, ~1-5 MB. NFR-3.6
links outgoing: NFR-3

Performance Targets
Constraint: Latency & Throughput NFR-4
links outgoing: BRD-5.2, BRD-8
links incoming: NFR-4.1, NFR-4.2, NFR-4.3, NFR-4.4, NFR-4.5, NFR-4.6, NFR-4.7, NFR-4.8, TDD-3.4
Constraint: **IPC Dispatch:** Sub-millisecond (<1ms) for metadata-only messages. NFR-4.1
links outgoing: NFR-4
Constraint: **Round Trip:** <5ms metadata-only; <20ms for 1MB payload (excluding processing). NFR-4.2
links outgoing: NFR-4
Constraint: **LLM Inference:** <1s average response time. NFR-4.3
links outgoing: NFR-4
Constraint: **TTS:** ≤2s average end-to-end response. NFR-4.4
links outgoing: NFR-4
Constraint: **UI Responsiveness:** No input blocking >100ms. NFR-4.5
links outgoing: NFR-4
Constraint: **Logging:** LogServer must support ≥ 10,000 msgs/sec. NFR-4.6
links outgoing: NFR-4
Constraint: **HSM:** Must support ≥ 1,000 state transitions/sec. NFR-4.7
links outgoing: NFR-4
Constraint: **Queue Operations:** O(log n) time (1-5 microseconds). NFR-4.8
links outgoing: NFR-4

Reliability Constraints
Constraint: Fault Tolerance NFR-5
links outgoing: BRD-2
links incoming: NFR-5.1, NFR-5.2, NFR-5.3, NFR-5.4, NFR-5.5, NFR-5.6, FSD-1, FSD-6, FSD-7, SAD-4, TDD-1.4, TDD-2.5
Constraint: **Non-blocking:** No process shall block waiting for another during standard IPC. NFR-5.1
links outgoing: NFR-5
Constraint: **Isolation:** Failures in UI, Runtime, or Audio must not cascade to Core. NFR-5.2
links outgoing: NFR-5
Constraint: **Fire-and-Forget:** Log messages are acceptable to be lost if LogServer is down. NFR-5.3
links outgoing: NFR-5
Constraint: **Timeout Accuracy:** Detection must be within ±100ms of configured limit. NFR-5.4
links outgoing: NFR-5
Constraint: **Core Failure:** In-flight requests are considered lost (MVP acceptable). NFR-5.5
links outgoing: NFR-5
Constraint: **Message Routability:** The Core must explicitly detect and handle attempts to send messages to disconnected or non-existent service identities. NFR-5.6
links outgoing: NFR-5
Constraint: Key Dependencies NFR-6
links outgoing: BRD-6
links incoming: NFR-6.1, NFR-6.2, NFR-6.3, NFR-6.4, NFR-6.5
Constraint: `PySide6`: Default GUI framework. NFR-6.1
links outgoing: NFR-6
Constraint: `pyzmq`: Non-blocking IPC. NFR-6.2
links outgoing: NFR-6
Constraint: `onnxruntime-gpu`: GPU inference. NFR-6.3
links outgoing: NFR-6
Constraint: `loguru`: Distributed logging. NFR-6.4
links outgoing: NFR-6
Constraint: `transitions`: HSM implementation. NFR-6.5
links outgoing: NFR-6
